alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 8:59PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Holt County through 930 PM CDT... At 858 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Page, or 13 miles southeast of O`neill, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ewing, Page, Inman and Dorsey. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 312 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 169 and 175. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.
